text: @WHO @WHOWPRO @WHOSEARO @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @pahowho We though that you would says that it would take around 18 months to create the vaccine until people in the Huston lab created a possible vaccine. Look like we got lucky!

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
